panels.title: 节点 CPU 使用明细
节点 CPU 平均负载

defaults.noValue: 没有超过 80% Limits CPU 的 Pod

targets.expr: sum by (namespace,pod,container)(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$node", image!="", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (namespace,pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{node="$node", resource="cpu"}) > 0.8

panels.title: Pod CPU Throttled 节流预测

defaults.noValue: 没有超过 80% Limits 内存的 Pod

targets.expr: sum by (namespace,pod,container)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{instance="$node", image!="", container!=""}) / sum by (namespace,pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{node="$node", resource="memory"}) > 0.8
